mapper.insert: insert into user values(null, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNickname}, #{userHp}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, null, false, false)
mapper.select: select user_no userNo, user_nickname userNickname, user_id userId, user_image userImage, user_kakao userKakao, user_naver userNaver from user where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}

select c.coupon_no couponNo, c.user_no userNo, cp.company_name companyName, c.coupon_price couponPrice, c.coupon_date couponDate from coupon c, user u, company cp where c.user_no = u.user_no and c.company_no = cp.company_no and u.user_no = #{no}
